column1: S0196.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S0196.DECK.  196. SURVEY NUMBER
S0196.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S0196.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE 1ST CLASS 2. CORPORAL (TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE) 3. SERGEANT (ANY GRADE) 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0196.Q2. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 5TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 5TH OR 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH OR 8TH GRADE 4. SOME HIGH SCHOOL, BUT DID NOT GRADUATE 5. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 6. SOME COLLEGE, BUT DID NOT FINISH 7. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE

S0196.Q3. IN WHAT PART OF THE STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF YOUR LIFE BEFORE COMING INTO THE ARM?  1. NORTH EAST 2. BORDER STATES 3. SOUTH 4. MID-WEST 5. WEST 0. NO ANSWER P. HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT YOUR DAILY LIFE:
S0196.Q4. HOW DO YOU USUALLY GET YOUR CLOTHES WASHED OR CLEANE?  1. USUALLY DO IT MYSELF 2. USUALLY GIVE IT TO GI LAUNDRY 3. USUALLY GIVE IT TO CIVILIANS 4. CIVILIANS AND MYSELF 5. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q5. DO YOU HAVE ENOUGH CLOTHING TO KEEP YOU WARM AND DR?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTIONS 6 AND 7 NOT CODED.

S0196.Q8. ON THE WHOLE, HOW SATISFIED DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE FOOD YOU GE?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. FAIRLY SATISFIED 3. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 9 NOT CODED.
S0196.Q10. IN GENERAL, WOULD YOU SAY YOU USUALLY GET ALL YOU WANT TO EAT OR NO?  1. USUALLY GET ALL I WANT TO EAT 2. USUALLY DON'T GET ENOUGH TO EAT 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q11. THE LAST TIME YOU WERE ON THE JOB WHAT SHIFT DID YOU WOR?  1. NIGHT SHIFT 2. DAY SHIFT 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q12. ON YOUR LAST WORK SHIFT, WHAT SORT OF MEALS DID YOU GET WHILE ON THE JO?  1. SANDWICH LUNCH 2. HOT LUNCH 3. K RATION 4. C RATION 5. OTHER 6. NONE 0. NO ANSWER

S0196.Q13. ON THE WHOLE, HOW SATISFIED DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE RECREATION AND ENTERTAINMENT THAT IS PROVIDED FOR MEN AT YOUR CAMP OR POS?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. FAIRLY SATISFIED 3. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 14 NOT CODED.

S0196.Q15. ON THE WHOLE, HOW SATISFIED DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE RECREATION AND ENTERTAINMENT YOU CAN FIND IN TOWN, WHEN YOU GO THERE ON A PAS?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. FAIRLY SATISFIED 3. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 16 NOT CODED.

S0196.Q17. ON THE WHOLE, HOW SATISFIED DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE BILLET YOU NOW LIVE I?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. FAIRLY SATISFIED 3. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0196.Q18. ON THE WHOLE, HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE SET UP OR ARRANGEMENTS FOR TAKING BATHS OR SHOWERS IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. FAIRLY SATISFIED 3. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q19. ON THE WHOLE, HOW SATISFIED DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE WAY PASSES ARE HANDLED IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. FAIRLY SATISFIED 3. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q20. HOW MANY TIMES HAVE YOU HAD A PASS DURING THE PAST TWO WEEK?  01. 1 TIME 02. 2 03. 2 TO 4 04. 3 TO 5 05. 4 TO 6 06. 5 TO 7 07. 6 TO 8 08. 8 09. 9 OR MORE TIMES 10. NONE 00. NO ANSWER

S0196.Q21. ON THE WHOLE, HOW SATISFIED DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE MEDICAL ATTENTION YOU GET IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. VERY SATISIFED 2. FAIRLY SATISFIED 3. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA P. NOW HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT YOUR JOB:

S0196.Q22. ON THE WHOLE, HOW SATISFIED DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE TRANSPORTATION YOU GET BACK AND FORTH FROM WOR?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. FAIRLY SATISFIED 3. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 5. DON'T NEED TRANSPORTATION TO GET TO WORK 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 23 NOT CODED.
S0196.Q24. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JO?  1. VERY SATISIFED 2. FAIRLY SATISFIED 3. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER

S0196.Q25. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS GIVING YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN D?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0196.Q26. HOW WELL DO THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT WORK TOGETHER ON THE JO?  1. VERY WELL 2. FAIRLY WELL 3. NOT VERY WELL 4. NOT WELL AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTIONS 27 AND 28 TO BE CODED TOGETHER.

S0196.Q27. DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD BE DOING MORE FOR THE WAR EFFORT OR LESS THAN YOU ARE NOW DOING, IF YOU WERE IN A COMBAT INFANTRY OUTFI? 0. THINK I WOULD BE DOING MORE IN A COMBAT INFANTRY OUTFIT 3. THINK I WOULD BE DOING ABOUT THE SAME 6. THINK I WOULD BE DOING LESS IN A COMBAT INFANTRY OUTFIT  Q.28. DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD BE DOING MORE FOR THE WAR EFFORT OR LESS THAN YOU ARE NOW DOING, IF YOU WERE IN THE MERCHANT MARIN? 1. THINK I WOULD BE DOING MORE IN THE MERCHANT MARINE 2. THINK I WOULD BE DOING ABOUT THE SAME 3. THINK I WOULD BE DOING LESS IN THE MERCHANT MARINE E. COMBINATION CODE FOR Q.27 AND Q.28. Z. IF NO ANSWER TO ONE OF TWO QUESTIONS: CODE 3 IN Q.27, CODE 2 IN Q.28.  1. Q.27 CODE 0, Q.28 CODE 1 2. Q.27 CODE 0, Q.28 CODE 2 3. Q.27 CODE 0, Q.28 CODE 3 4. Q.27 CODE 3, Q.28 CODE 1 5. Q.27 CODE 3. Q.28 CODE 2 6. Q.27 CODE 3, Q.28 CODE 3 7. Q.27 CODE 6, Q.28 CODE 1 8. Q.27 CODE 6, Q.28 CODE 2 9. Q.27 CODE 6, Q.28 CODE 3 0. NO ANSWER TO BOTH QUESTIONS
S0196.Q29. HAVE YOU EVER BEEN IN ANY BRANCH OF SERVICE OTHER THAN THE ONE YOU ARE NOW I?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 30 NOT CODED.

S0196.Q31. WOULD YOU HONESTLY SAY THAT YOU USUALLY PUT ALL YOU HAVE INTO YOUR REGULAR ARMY DUTIES, OR DO YOU USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. I USUALLY PUT ALL I HAVE INTO IT 2. I USUALLY WORK HARD BUT COULD DO MORE 3. I USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0196.Q32. ON THE WHOLE, ARE YOU TOLD TOO MUCH, OR TOO LITTLE ABOUT HOW TO DO YOUR JO?  1. TOO MUCH 2. ABOUT RIGHT AMOUNT 3. TOO LITTLE 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q33. HAVE ANY PROMISES BEEN MADE TO YOU DURING THE LAST FEW MONTHS OR SO WHICH HAVE NOT BEEN KEP?  1. NO, NEVER 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. YES, FREQUENTLY 0. NO ANSWER

S0196.Q34. IF YOU HAVE A GOOD IDEA ON HOW TO IMPROVE SOME PART OF THE WORK YOUR OUTFIT IS DOING, IS IT USUALLY POSSIBLE FOR YOU TO TELL SOMEONE WHO CAN PUT YOUR IDEA INTO US?  1. IT IS USUALLY EASY TO TELL SOMEONE WHO CAN PUT IDEA INTO USE 2. IT IS USUALLY HARD TO TELL SOMEONE WHO CAN PUT IDEA INTO USE 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q35. HOW OFTEN ARE GOOD SUGGESTIONS WHICH COME FROM THE MEN PUT INTO US?  1. ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. RARELY 4. NEVER 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S0196.Q36. DO YOU KNOW IF RECORDS ARE NOW KEPT BY THE PORT ON THE AMOUNT OF TONNAGE OR SUPPLIES THAT IS LOADED OR UNLOADED BY DIFFERENT OUTFIT?  1. I DON'T KNOW IF THEY ARE OR NOT 2. YES, THESE RECORDS ARE KEPT 3. NO, THESE RECORDS ARE NOT KEPT 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0196.Q37. DO YOU KNOW HOW YOUR OUTFIT COMPARES WITH OTHERS IN THE AMOUNT OF TONNAGE PUT OU?  1. NO, I DO NOT KNOW 2. MY OUTFIT PUTS OUT MORE TONNAGE THAN MOST OF THE OTHERS 3. MY OUTFIT PUTS OUT ABOUT THE SAME AS OTHERS 4. MY OUTFIT PUTS OUT LESS TONNAGE THAN MOST OF THE OTHERS 0. NO ANSWER

S0196.Q38. DO YOU THINK MEN WORK BETTER IF THEY ARE TOLD THE AMOUNT OF TONNAGE OF GOODS LOADED AND UNLOADE?  1. I THINK IT HELPS VERY MUCH 2. I THINK IT HELPS SOME 3. I DON'T THINK IT HELPS AT ALL 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0196.Q39. USUALLY ABOUT HOW LONG IS YOUR PRESENT WORK DA? (DO NOT COUNT THE TIME IT TAKES TO GET TO WORK AND BACK - ONLY COUNT THE TIME YOU ARE SUPPOSED TO BE AT YOUR JOB)  01. 7 HOURS 02. 8 HOURS 03. 9 HOURS 04. 10 HOURS 05. 11 HOURS 06. 12 HOURS 07. 13 HOURS 08. OTHER 09. UNDER 7 HOURS 10. OVER 13 HOURS 00. NO ANSWER

S0196.Q40. ON THE AVERAGE, HOW MANY OF THE HOURS YOU ARE ON THE JOB EACH DAY DO YOU ACTUALLY SPEND WORKING AND HOW MANY HOURS DO YOU SPEND WAITING AROUND BECAUSE THERE ISN'T ANY WORK TO D? E. RESPONSES REFLECT ONLY "WAITING AROUND" HOURS.  01. 1/2 HOUR WAITING AROUND 02. 1 HOUR WAITING AROUND 03. 1 1/2 HOURS WAITING AROUND 04. 2 HOURS WAITING AROUND 05. 2 1/2 HOURS WAITING AROUND 06. 3 HOURS WAITING AROUND 07. 3 1/2 HOURS WAITING AROUND 08. 4 HOURS WAITING AROUND 09. 4 1/2 HOURS WAITING AROUND 10. NO HOURS WAITING AROUND 11. INTERPRETED QUESTION INCORRECTLY 00. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q41. DO TOO MANY OF THE THINGS YOU HAVE TO DO ON THE JOB SEEM UNNECESSAR?  1. YES, TOO MANY OF THEM DO SEEM UNNECESSARY 2. NO, NOT TOO MANY OF THEM SEEM UNNECESSARY 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q42. WHEN YOU ARE WORKING DO YOU GET TIME OFF FOR REGULAR REST BREAK? (DO NOT INCLUDE LUNCH PERIOD)  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q43. WHEN THE GROUP OF MEN YOU WORK WITH DOES AN EXTRA GOOD JOB DO THEY USUALLY GET PRAISE OR CREDIT FOR I?  1. ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. RARELY 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q44. ON THE WHOLE, HOW GOOD A JOB IS DONE BY THOSE IN AUTHORITY IN PLANNING YOUR WOR?  1. VERY GOOD 2. FAIRLY GOOD 3. NOT SO GOOD 4. NOT GOOD AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0196.Q45. DO YOU THINK EVERYTHING POSSIBLE IS BEING DONE TO PREVENT WASTE OF GOODS IN THE STOCK PILES AT THE DOCK?  1. A LOT MORE COULD BE DONE 2. SOME MORE COULD BE DONE 3. EVERYTHING POSSIBLE IS BEING DONE NOW 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q46. DO YOU FEEL THAT THE AMOUNT OF GOODS LOST THROUGH PILFERING IS SERIOUS ENOUGH TO WORRY ABOU?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q47. DO YOU FEEL THAT ABOUT EVERYTHING POSSIBLE IS DONE TO LOOK AFTER THE WELFARE OF THE MEN WHILE THEY ARE ON THE JO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0196.Q48. CONSIDERING EVERYTHING (ABOUT YOUR JOB AND YOUR OFF-DUTY TIME AS WELL) WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE BETTER OFF NOW OR WORSE OFF NOW THAN YOU WERE A MONTH OR SO AG?  1. I AM BETTER OFF NOW 2. I AM WORSE OFF NOW 3. ABOUT THE SAME 0. NO ANSWER P. HERE ARE A FEW GENERAL QUESTIONS:
S0196.Q49. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPAN?  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT VERY PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q50. ON THE WHOLE, HOW IS THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPAN?  1. VERY HIGH 2. FAIRLY HIGH 3. JUST SO-SO 4. FAIRLY LOW 5. VERY LOW 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q51. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU REALLY BELONG IN YOUR COMPANY AND ARE AN IMPORTANT PART OF I?  1. VERY MUCH SO 2. FAIRLY MUCH SO 3. NOT VERY MUCH 4. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q52. DO YOU FEEL THAT THE MOST DESERVING MEN USUALLY GET THE "BREAKS" IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. RARELY 5. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0196.Q53. IN YOUR OUTFIT, WHEN A MAN BREAKS A RULE OR DISOBEYS AN ORDER DOES HE USUALLY GET THE PUNISHMENT YOU THINK HE HAS COMING TO HI?  1. HE GETS TOO MUCH PUNISHMENT 2. HE GETS ABOUT WHAT HE SHOULD 3. HE GET TOO LITTLE PUNISHMENT 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q54. IN YOUR PRESENT OUTFIT HAVE YOU EVER BEEN GIVEN PUNISHMENT OR RESTRICTION FOR SOMETHING WHICH YOU FEEL YOU DID NOT DESERV?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S0196.Q55. DO TOO MANY OF THE THINGS YOU HAVE TO DO WHILE OFF THE JOB SEEM UNNECESSAR?  1. YES, TOO MANY OF THEM DO SEEM UNNECESSARY 2. NO, NOT TOO MANY OF THEM SEEM UNNECESSARY 0. NO ANSWER P. HERE ARE A FEW MORE GENERAL QUESTIONS: X. QUESTION 56 NOT CODED.
S0196.Q57. WHAT SORT OF OPINION DO YOU HAVE OF THE ENGLISH PEOPL?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE 4. VERY UNFAVORABLE 0. NO ANSWER
S0196.Q58. WHAT SORT OF OPINION DO YOU HAVE OF THE FRENCH PEOPL?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE 4. VERY UNFAVORABLE 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0196.Q59. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE WAY GERMAN PRISONERS OF WAR ARE TREATE?  1. TREATED TOO WELL 2. TREATED ABOUT RIGHT 3. NOT TREATED WELL ENOUGH 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 60 AND 61 NOT CODED.
S0196.V62. LOCATION OF CROSS-SECTION COMPANIES:  1. LE HAVRE CROSS-SECTION COMPANIES 2. ROUEN CROSS-SECTION COMPANIES 3. CHERBOURG CROSS-SECTION COMPANIES

S0196.V64. WHITE OR NEGRO COMPANY:  1. WHITE COMPANY 2. NEGRO COMPANY
S0196.V65. PORT LOCATION:  1. LE HAVRE 2. ROUEN 3. CHERBOURG
